snippet: Three years after the earthquake and nuclear disaster, the reconstruction effort by the Japanese government has been insufficient and painfully slow.
abstract: Editorial observes on the third anniversary of the earthquake, tsunami and resultant nuclear disaster in Japan that the government's reconstruction efforts have been insufficient and painfully slow; calls for more direction and engagement from the central government.
lead_paragraph: Three years after the earthquake and nuclear disaster, the reconstruction effort by the Japanese government has been insufficient and painfully slow.
